 <script type="text/javascript">
     jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {


		 $('#gomenu51203b5d54').find(".dir.mm-selected").removeClass("mm-selected").parent().parent().addClass("mm-selected")
		 
         $('#gomenu51203b5d54').mobile_menu({
             slidingSubmenus: true,
             counters: true,
             navbartitle: "Menu",
             headerbox: ".menu_header",
             footerbox: ".menu_footer"			 
         });
		 
		  $('#gomenu51203b5d54').find("a[href='javascript:;']").on("click",function (e) {
			  e.preventDefault();
			  $(this).siblings(".mm-next").click();
		  })
     });
</script>

    <div class="searchBox2   " id="search2" >
      <span id="dnn_dnnSEARCH5_ClassicSearch">
    
    
    <span class="searchInputContainer" data-moreresults="Ver más resultados" data-noresult="No se han encontrado resultados">
        <input name="dnn$dnnSEARCH5$txtSearch" type="text" maxlength="255" size="20" id="dnn_dnnSEARCH5_txtSearch" class="NormalTextBox" aria-label="Search" autocomplete="off" placeholder="Buscar..." />
        <a class="dnnSearchBoxClearText" title="Limpiar texto de búsqueda"></a>
    </span>
    <a id="dnn_dnnSEARCH5_cmdSearch" class="search" href="javascript:__doPostBack(&#39;dnn$dnnSEARCH5$cmdSearch&#39;,&#39;&#39;)">GO</a>
</span>


<script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        if (typeof dnn != "undefined" && typeof dnn.searchSkinObject != "undefined") {
            var searchSkinObject = new dnn.searchSkinObject({
                delayTriggerAutoSearch : 400,
                minCharRequiredTriggerAutoSearch : 2,
                searchType: 'S',
                enableWildSearch: true,
                cultureCode: 'es-ES',
                portalId: -1
                }
            );
            searchSkinObject.init();
            
            
            // attach classic search
            var siteBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH5_SiteRadioButton');
            var webBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH5_WebRadioButton');
            var clickHandler = function() {
                if (siteBtn.is(':checked')) searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'S';
                else searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'W';
            };
            siteBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            webBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            
            
        }
    });
</script>

    </div>
    <div class="Login  ElementHide-xs ElementHide-sm ElementHide-md ElementHide-lg">

    </ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        if (typeof dnn != "undefined" && typeof dnn.searchSkinObject != "undefined") {
            var searchSkinObject = new dnn.searchSkinObject({
                delayTriggerAutoSearch : 400,
                minCharRequiredTriggerAutoSearch : 2,
                searchType: 'S',
                enableWildSearch: true,
                cultureCode: 'es-ES',
                portalId: -1
                }
            );
            searchSkinObject.init();
            
            
            // attach classic search
            var siteBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH_SiteRadioButton');
            var webBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH_WebRadioButton');
            var clickHandler = function() {
                if (siteBtn.is(':checked')) searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'S';
                else searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'W';
            };
            siteBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            webBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            
            
        }
    });
</script>

        $("#dnngo_megamenu88788674eb").dnngomegamenu({

            delay_disappear: 500,

			delay_show:150,

        });

<div class="dnn_layout">
  <div class="content_mid clearfix">
    <div class="pane_layout">
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-sm-12">
          <div id="dnn_TopPane" class="TopPane"><div class="DnnModule DnnModule-DnnPtContacto DnnModule-593"><a name="593"></a>
<div class="White">
     <div id="dnn_ctr593_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_593 --><div id="dnn_ctr593_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDnnPtContactoC">
	<div id="mvcContainer-593">
    



<div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
            <div class="Lead">
                <img alt="" src="/Portals/0/ConsejoNacionalDeCardiologia/Imagenes/contacto.jpg" class="img-responsive" title="" />
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row" style="padding-top: 50px;">
        <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                    <strong>Dinos tu opini&oacute;n</strong>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row" style="padding-top: 10px">
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" name="nombre" placeholder="Nombre" required="required" />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" name="apellidos" placeholder="Apellidos" required="required" />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <input type="email" class="form-control" name="correo" placeholder="Correo Electónico" required="required" />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                    <textarea class="form-control" placeholder="Mensaje" name="mensaje" rows="15" required="required"></textarea>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-6">
                    <div class="g-recaptcha" data-sitekey="6Lc6uWcUAAAAAE7u9dlpSGHJZCmxYK9KO58c8Pld" style="padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 20px;"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-6 text-right" style="padding-top: 20px;">
                    <input type="submit" class="btn btn-danger" style="width: 60%; background-color: #D2021B;" value="Enviar" />

                    
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6">
            <!-- Maps -->
            <script src='https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?v=3.exp&key=AIzaSyBlzAcEsQ91QDm1tRc-jmoP-xmnWqXKdE8'></script>
            <div style='overflow:hidden;height:491px;width:535px;'>
                <div id='gmap_canvas' style='height:491px;width:535px;'></div>
                <style>
                    #gmap_canvas img {
                        max-width: none !important;
                        background: none !important
                    }
                </style>
            </div>
            <a href='https://embedmap.org/'>.</a>
            <script type='text/javascript' src='https://embedmaps.com/google-maps-authorization/script.js?id=444bce267fb58828b13057a1caa15619eb01bc3c'></script>
            <script type='text/javascript'>
                function init_map() {
                    var myOptions = {
                        zoom: 15,
                        center: new google.maps.LatLng(19.2912545, -99.15362099999999),
                        mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP
                    };
                    map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('gmap_canvas'), myOptions);
                    marker = new google.maps.Marker({
                        map: map,
                        position: new google.maps.LatLng(19.2912545, -99.15362099999999)
                    });
                    infowindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({
                        content: 'Consejo Mexicano de Cardiología'
                    });
                    google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'click', function () {
                        infowindow.open(map, marker);
                    });
                    infowindow.open(map, marker);
                }
                google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', init_map);
            </script>
            <!-- Fin maps -->
            <br />
            <p>
                <span class="fa fa-map-marker"></span> Calle: Juan Badiano No. 1, Edif. Santiago Galas 1er piso, Col. Sección XVI, Delegación Tlalpan, C.P. 14080, México, D.F.
            </p>
            <p>
                <span class="fa fa-phone"></span> Tels: 5485•1405, 5513•2192
            </p>
            <p>
                <span class="fa fa-clock-o"></span> Horario de atención es de 9:00 a 17:00 hrs.
            </p>
            <p>
                <ul style="list-style: none; margin-left: 0px;">
                    <li>
                        <span class="fa fa-envelope"></span> certificacion@consejomexcardio.org
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <span class="fa fa-envelope"></span> vigencia@consejomexcardio.org
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <span class="fa fa-envelope"></span> consejo@consejomexcardio.org
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    
    <script src='https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js'></script>

</div>

<div class="White">
     <div id="dnn_ctr612_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_612 --><div id="dnn_ctr612_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">

<script type="text/javascript" src="/Portals/_default/skins/20043-unlimitedcolorpack-029/scripts/script.js"></script> 
<script type="text/javascript" src="/Portals/_default/skins/20043-unlimitedcolorpack-029/scripts/custom.js"></script> 
<script type="text/javascript">

if(mapapikey && mapapikey!=""){
}else{
	var mapapikey="";
}

	function customMap() {
		
				
					$('#gmap01').gmap3({
			  marker:{
				values:[{
				  address:'Juan Badiano No. 1, Edif. Santiago Galas 1er piso, Col. Sección XVI, Delegación Tlalpan, C.P. 14080, México, D.F.', 
				  data:'Map 01 Markers',
				  options:{
												icon: "/Portals/_default/skins/20043-unlimitedcolorpack-029/Thumbnails/mapicon02.png"
																	  }
				  }],
				options:{
				  draggable: false
				},
				events:{
				  click: function(marker, event, context){
					var map = $(this).gmap3("get"),
					  infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.open(map, marker);
					  infowindow.setContent(context.data);
					} else {
					  $(this).gmap3({
						infowindow:{
						  anchor:marker, 
						  options:{content: context.data}
						}
					  });
					}
				  },
				  closeclick: function(){
					var infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.close();
					}
				  }
				}
			  },
			  map:{
				options:{
					mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP,
					mapTypeControl: true,
					mapTypeControlOptions: {
					  style: google.maps.MapTypeControlStyle.DROPDOWN_MENU
					},
					navigationControl: true ,
				  zoom: 15,
				  scrollwheel: true
				}
			  }
			});
				
				
					$('#gmap02').gmap3({
			  marker:{
				values:[{
				  address:'Bear city, ny', 
				  data:'Map 02 Markers',
				  options:{
												icon: "/Portals/_default/skins/20043-unlimitedcolorpack-029/Thumbnails/mapicon01.png"
																	  }
				  }],
				options:{
				  draggable: false
				},
				events:{
				  click: function(marker, event, context){
					var map = $(this).gmap3("get"),
					  infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.open(map, marker);
					  infowindow.setContent(context.data);
					} else {
					  $(this).gmap3({
						infowindow:{
						  anchor:marker, 
						  options:{content: context.data}
						}
					  });
					}
				  },
				  closeclick: function(){
					var infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.close();
					}
				  }
				}
			  },
			  map:{
				options:{
					mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.HYBRID,
					mapTypeControl: true,
					mapTypeControlOptions: {
					  style: google.maps.MapTypeControlStyle.DROPDOWN_MENU
					},
					navigationControl: true ,
				  zoom: 8,
				  scrollwheel: true
				}
			  }
			});
				
				
				
				
				
				
				}
</script>










        <input name="ScrollTop" type="hidden" id="ScrollTop" />
        <input name="__dnnVariable" type="hidden" id="__dnnVariable" autocomplete="off" value="`{`__scdoff`:`1`,`dnn.scripts.js.resx`:`/WebResource.axd?d=DKiEc2s7S-76aXiADsH2Oh6mKXO0atrg-vhIxyEL8Jp9Kab0AZtRsopYkhO52Fyg8u47v_5zwFXGvTQNBeNomM6bYAU1\u0026t=636694836182369474`,`sf_siteRoot`:`/`,`sf_tabId`:`85`}" />
